attributes.action: All MPs and public broadcasters release all written & electronic communications.
attributes.additional_details: If Parliament can demand specific individuals’ private messages, then the public have a right to demand that all MPs and British public broadcasters, including public broadcasters and journalists, release their private messages.
attributes.background: This petition demands all written/electronic communications from MPs & broadcasters surrounding Brexit is published. That includes services including WhatsApp, Telegram, Signal, private email accounts both encrypted & unencrypted, text messaging & iMessage & official & unofficial mobile phones.

rejection.details:
It's not the UK Government's or Parliament responsibility to release all broadcasters' written and electronic communications about Brexit. 

We're not exactly sure which communications you're concerned about. You could start a new petition calling for a clear action that is the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.
